sourcesContent:
import React from "react"; import "../Styles/Aboutmestyles.css"; export default function AboutMe() { return (

About Me

I specialize in React, JavaScript, and responsive design. My approach focuses on crafting intuitive, visually engaging interfaces that make users fall in love with the product experience.

Every design decision—from layout to color palette—is made to spark trust, delight, and lasting connection. What sets me apart is my hunger to learn and my refusal to be stopped by technical roadblocks.

Whether it's troubleshooting layout bugs or mastering new frameworks, I'm not just building websites. I'm building a future where creativity meets resilience.

); }
